definition: to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)

sentences.english: At present, a radiology training program lasts five years.
sentences.chinese: 目前，放射学培训计划为期五年。

sentences.english: Definitive diagnosis depends upon either endoscopy or radiology .
sentences.chinese: 肯定的诊断有赖于放射学或内腔镜检查。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the radiological character of drinking brick-tea type fluorosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察饮茶型氟骨症骨关节损害的放射学特点。

sentences.english: The above datas provides anatomical evidence for microsurgery and interventional radiology.
sentences.chinese: 研究数据为显微外科学和介入放射学提供解剖学依据。

sentences.english: This integration is a prerequisite of teleradiology .
sentences.chinese: 这种结合是远程放射学的先决条件。

sentences.english: Once the prominence of the prosthesis was discovered, a lateral radiograph was performed to confirm position.
sentences.chinese: 发现假体的突起后，通过侧位放射学检查证实定位。

sentences.english: Brenner is head of the Center for Radiological Research at Columbia University.
sentences.chinese: 布伦纳是哥伦比亚大学放射学研究中心的主任。

sentences.english: Objective To explore radiograph film processing in order to satisfy teleradiology.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究影像胶片处理以达到远程放射学的要求。

sentences.english: We also investigated the association between the clinical and radiographic results.
sentences.chinese: 我们也研究了临床疗效和放射学结果之间的关系。

sentences.english: Radiography is the use of ionizing electromagnetic radiation such as X-rays to view objects.
sentences.chinese: 放射学是利用电离电磁辐射，如X射线视图对象。

sentences.english: Radiographic and clinical results were assessed over 3 to 5 years of follow up.
sentences.chinese: 在长达3到5年的随访中，评估其临床及放射学效果。

sentences.english: Microcalcifications are the primary radiological indicator of early breast cancers.
sentences.chinese: 钙化点是乳腺癌早期的一个主要放射学征象。

sentences.english: Most modern injected radiographic positive contrast media are iodine-based.
sentences.chinese: 大多数现代注射放射学阳性造影剂碘。

sentences.english: Radiologic diagnosis will be given precedence .
sentences.chinese: 将给予放射学诊断以优先。

sentences.english: Louis, he joined the University of Southern California as an Assistant Professor of Radiology.
sentences.chinese: 随后他进入美国南加州大学任放射学助理教授。
